name: ProjectX (itch)
description:
ProjectX(Place holder name) is a stealth game with a topdown camera where you need to hide from your enemies and slice them when they don't see you.  In this version, mechanics are presented although level design and challenges are not completed.

Credits;

-Programming and Level Design : Atakan Vardar

-Level Design and 3d Models: Enes Saatçi

-Character model, VFX and some animations: Furkan Doğan
